short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your new tab page with the tranquil beauty of Serene Dusk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Serene Dusk brings the peaceful, calming atmosphere of a twilight lakeside right to your screen. The image features a tranquil lake surrounded by rugged rocks and mountains, with soft clouds reflecting gentle hues of pink and blue in the sky.

This serene landscape is designed to create a soothing environment, helping you unwind and enhance your focus every time you open a new tab. Let Serene Dusk be the perfect backdrop for your browsing experience, offering a sense of calm and relaxation with each view.
